GetMallExhibitsConfigList.Statement:
-- 全件数取得 DECLARE @row_count int SELECT @row_count = ISNULL(COUNT(w2_Product.product_id), 0) FROM w2_Product INNER JOIN w2_MallExhibitsConfig ON -- 紐づけて表示させる場合は、LEFT JOINに変更する ( w2_Product.shop_id = w2_MallExhibitsConfig.shop_id AND w2_Product.product_id = w2_MallExhibitsConfig.product_id ) [[ MALLEXHIBITSCONFIG_SEARCH_WHERE ]]
-- 該当情報取得 SELECT w2_Product.shop_id, w2_Product.product_id, w2_Product.name, w2_Product.name_kana, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg1, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg2, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg3, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg4, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg5, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg6, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg7, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg8, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg9, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg10, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg11, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg12, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg13, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg14, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg15, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg16, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg17, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg18, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg19, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg20, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.date_created, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.date_changed, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.last_changed, @row_count AS row_count FROM ( SELECT w2_Product.shop_id, w2_Product.product_id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( [[ MALLEXHIBITSCONFIG_SEARCH_ORDER_BY ]] ) AS row_num FROM w2_Product INNER JOIN w2_MallExhibitsConfig ON ( w2_Product.shop_id = w2_MallExhibitsConfig.shop_id AND w2_Product.product_id = w2_MallExhibitsConfig.product_id ) [[ MALLEXHIBITSCONFIG_SEARCH_WHERE ]] ) AS RowIndex INNER JOIN w2_Product ON ( RowIndex.shop_id = w2_Product.shop_id AND RowIndex.product_id = w2_Product.product_id ) INNER JOIN w2_MallExhibitsConfig ON ( w2_Product.shop_id = w2_MallExhibitsConfig.shop_id AND w2_Product.product_id = w2_MallExhibitsConfig.product_id ) WHERE @bgn_row_num <= RowIndex.row_num AND RowIndex.row_num <= @end_row_num ORDER BY RowIndex.row_num ASC

GetMallExhibitsConfigCount.Statement: -- 全件数取得 SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(w2_Product.product_id), 0) AS row_count FROM w2_Product INNER JOIN w2_MallExhibitsConfig ON -- 紐づけて表示させる場合は、LEFT JOINに変更する ( w2_Product.shop_id = w2_MallExhibitsConfig.shop_id AND w2_Product.product_id = w2_MallExhibitsConfig.product_id ) [[ MALLEXHIBITSCONFIG_SEARCH_WHERE ]]

GetMallExhibitsConfigMaster.Statement: SELECT @@ fields @@ FROM w2_Product INNER JOIN w2_MallExhibitsConfig ON ( w2_Product.shop_id = w2_MallExhibitsConfig.shop_id AND w2_Product.product_id = w2_MallExhibitsConfig.product_id ) -- 全件出力のため、条件は有効フラグのみとする WHERE w2_Product.valid_flg = '1' -- 有効 [[ MALLEXHIBITSCONFIG_SEARCH_ORDER_BY ]]

UpdateMallExhibitsConfig.Statement: UPDATE w2_MallExhibitsConfig SET w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg1 = @exhibits_flg1, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg2 = @exhibits_flg2, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg3 = @exhibits_flg3, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg4 = @exhibits_flg4, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg5 = @exhibits_flg5, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg6 = @exhibits_flg6, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg7 = @exhibits_flg7, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg8 = @exhibits_flg8, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg9 = @exhibits_flg9, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg10 = @exhibits_flg10, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg11 = @exhibits_flg11, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg12 = @exhibits_flg12, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg13 = @exhibits_flg13, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg14 = @exhibits_flg14, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg15 = @exhibits_flg15, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg16 = @exhibits_flg16, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg17 = @exhibits_flg17, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg18 = @exhibits_flg18, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg19 = @exhibits_flg19, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg20 = @exhibits_flg20, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.date_changed = getdate(), w2_MallExhibitsConfig.last_changed = @last_changed WHERE w2_MallExhibitsConfig.shop_id = @shop_id AND w2_MallExhibitsConfig.product_id = @product_id

DeleteMallExhibitsConfig.Statement: -- 削除 DELETE w2_MallExhibitsConfig WHERE w2_MallExhibitsConfig.shop_id = @shop_id AND w2_MallExhibitsConfig.product_id = @product_id

UpdateInsertMallExhibitsConfig.Statement:
DECLARE @MallExhibitsCount int
SELECT @MallExhibitsCount = COUNT(product_id) FROM w2_MallExhibitsConfig WHERE w2_MallExhibitsConfig.shop_id = @shop_id AND w2_MallExhibitsConfig.product_id = @product_id
IF @MallExhibitsCount > 0 BEGIN UPDATE w2_MallExhibitsConfig SET w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg1 = @exhibits_flg1, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg2 = @exhibits_flg2, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg3 = @exhibits_flg3, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg4 = @exhibits_flg4, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg5 = @exhibits_flg5, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg6 = @exhibits_flg6, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg7 = @exhibits_flg7, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg8 = @exhibits_flg8, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg9 = @exhibits_flg9, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg10 = @exhibits_flg10, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg11 = @exhibits_flg11, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg12 = @exhibits_flg12, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg13 = @exhibits_flg13, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg14 = @exhibits_flg14, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg15 = @exhibits_flg15, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg16 = @exhibits_flg16, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg17 = @exhibits_flg17, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg18 = @exhibits_flg18, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg19 = @exhibits_flg19, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg20 = @exhibits_flg20, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.date_changed = getdate(), w2_MallExhibitsConfig.last_changed = @last_changed WHERE w2_MallExhibitsConfig.shop_id = @shop_id AND w2_MallExhibitsConfig.product_id = @product_id END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO w2_MallExhibitsConfig ( shop_id, product_id, exhibits_flg1, exhibits_flg2, exhibits_flg3, exhibits_flg4, exhibits_flg5, exhibits_flg6, exhibits_flg7, exhibits_flg8, exhibits_flg9, exhibits_flg10, exhibits_flg11, exhibits_flg12, exhibits_flg13, exhibits_flg14, exhibits_flg15, exhibits_flg16, exhibits_flg17, exhibits_flg18, exhibits_flg19, exhibits_flg20, date_created, date_changed, last_changed ) VALUES ( @shop_id, @product_id, @exhibits_flg1, @exhibits_flg2, @exhibits_flg3, @exhibits_flg4, @exhibits_flg5, @exhibits_flg6, @exhibits_flg7, @exhibits_flg8, @exhibits_flg9, @exhibits_flg10, @exhibits_flg11, @exhibits_flg12, @exhibits_flg13, @exhibits_flg14, @exhibits_flg15, @exhibits_flg16, @exhibits_flg17, @exhibits_flg18, @exhibits_flg19, @exhibits_flg20, getdate(), getdate(), @last_changed ) END

GetMallExhibitsConfigAll.Statement: SELECT w2_MallExhibitsConfig.* FROM w2_MallExhibitsConfig WHERE w2_MallExhibitsConfig.shop_id = @shop_id AND w2_MallExhibitsConfig.product_id = @product_id

UpdateMallExhibitsConfigReset.Statement:
IF @exhibits_flg1 = '1' BEGIN UPDATE w2_MallExhibitsConfig SET w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg1 = @exhibits_flg1, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.date_changed = getdate(), w2_MallExhibitsConfig.last_changed = @last_changed WHERE w2_MallExhibitsConfig.shop_id = @shop_id END
IF @exhibits_flg2 = '1' BEGIN UPDATE w2_MallExhibitsConfig SET w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg2 = @exhibits_flg2, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.date_changed = getdate(), w2_MallExhibitsConfig.last_changed = @last_changed WHERE w2_MallExhibitsConfig.shop_id = @shop_id END
IF @exhibits_flg3 = '1' BEGIN UPDATE w2_MallExhibitsConfig SET w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg3 = @exhibits_flg3, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.date_changed = getdate(), w2_MallExhibitsConfig.last_changed = @last_changed WHERE w2_MallExhibitsConfig.shop_id = @shop_id END

IF @exhibits_flg7 = '1' BEGIN UPDATE w2_MallExhibitsConfig SET w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg7 = @exhibits_flg7, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.date_changed = getdate(), w2_MallExhibitsConfig.last_changed = @last_changed WHERE w2_MallExhibitsConfig.shop_id = @shop_id END

IF @exhibits_flg9 = '1' BEGIN UPDATE w2_MallExhibitsConfig SET w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg9 = @exhibits_flg9, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.date_changed = getdate(), w2_MallExhibitsConfig.last_changed = @last_changed WHERE w2_MallExhibitsConfig.shop_id = @shop_id END
IF @exhibits_flg10 = '1' BEGIN UPDATE w2_MallExhibitsConfig SET w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg10 = @exhibits_flg10, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.date_changed = getdate(), w2_MallExhibitsConfig.last_changed = @last_changed WHERE w2_MallExhibitsConfig.shop_id = @shop_id END
IF @exhibits_flg11 = '1' BEGIN UPDATE w2_MallExhibitsConfig SET w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg11 = @exhibits_flg11, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.date_changed = getdate(), w2_MallExhibitsConfig.last_changed = @last_changed WHERE w2_MallExhibitsConfig.shop_id = @shop_id END
IF @exhibits_flg12 = '1' BEGIN UPDATE w2_MallExhibitsConfig SET w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg12 = @exhibits_flg12, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.date_changed = getdate(), w2_MallExhibitsConfig.last_changed = @last_changed WHERE w2_MallExhibitsConfig.shop_id = @shop_id END
IF @exhibits_flg13 = '1' BEGIN UPDATE w2_MallExhibitsConfig SET w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg13 = @exhibits_flg13, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.date_changed = getdate(), w2_MallExhibitsConfig.last_changed = @last_changed WHERE w2_MallExhibitsConfig.shop_id = @shop_id END
IF @exhibits_flg14 = '1' BEGIN UPDATE w2_MallExhibitsConfig SET w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg14 = @exhibits_flg14, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.date_changed = getdate(), w2_MallExhibitsConfig.last_changed = @last_changed WHERE w2_MallExhibitsConfig.shop_id = @shop_id END
IF @exhibits_flg15 = '1' BEGIN UPDATE w2_MallExhibitsConfig SET w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg15 = @exhibits_flg15, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.date_changed = getdate(), w2_MallExhibitsConfig.last_changed = @last_changed WHERE w2_MallExhibitsConfig.shop_id = @shop_id END
IF @exhibits_flg16 = '1' BEGIN UPDATE w2_MallExhibitsConfig SET w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg16 = @exhibits_flg16, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.date_changed = getdate(), w2_MallExhibitsConfig.last_changed = @last_changed WHERE w2_MallExhibitsConfig.shop_id = @shop_id END
IF @exhibits_flg17 = '1' BEGIN UPDATE w2_MallExhibitsConfig SET w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg17 = @exhibits_flg17, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.date_changed = getdate(), w2_MallExhibitsConfig.last_changed = @last_changed WHERE w2_MallExhibitsConfig.shop_id = @shop_id END
IF @exhibits_flg18 = '1' BEGIN UPDATE w2_MallExhibitsConfig SET w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg18 = @exhibits_flg18, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.date_changed = getdate(), w2_MallExhibitsConfig.last_changed = @last_changed WHERE w2_MallExhibitsConfig.shop_id = @shop_id END

IF @exhibits_flg20 = '1' BEGIN UPDATE w2_MallExhibitsConfig SET w2_MallExhibitsConfig.exhibits_flg20 = @exhibits_flg20, w2_MallExhibitsConfig.date_changed = getdate(), w2_MallExhibitsConfig.last_changed = @last_changed WHERE w2_MallExhibitsConfig.shop_id = @shop_id END
